page.title: 17Frankie's day - 1
page.content: First my sister wakes me up at about 7.30 am., and I get out of bed half asleep. Then its to the bathroom where I wash my face and brush my teeth. Then I return to my bedroom and go to my wardrobe where I choose my trousers. I put these on along with a T shirt, a jumper and a pair of socks. When I am dressed, I go downstairs and pour myself a coffee which I always have black and sugarless. I then wander into the lounge to watch a bit of 'Good Morning Britain' on the television or to look at my horoscope on the Oracle page in the paper. At 8.30 I leave for school. Its my job to ring the bell. After the bell has rung everyone goes into the hall for assembly when a teacher tells us a story. Then its classwork until 11.55 with a playtime from 10.30 till 10.45.
